summary: An expansion of the \'Wand of Immolation\' concept - adding a static textured variant & a particle system/dynamic effect variant for Shock & Frost Enchantments/Effects - Includes the \'Wand of Immolation\' variants also. Enchanted with the Expert Level Destruction Spells \'Incinerate\' \'ThunderBolt\' & \'Icy Spear\'
descriptionHtml: An expansion of the \'Wand of Immolation\' concept - adding a static textured variant & a particle system/dynamic effect variant for Shock & Frost Enchantments/Effects - Includes the \'Wand of Immolation\' variants also. Enchanted with the Expert Level Destruction Spells \'Incinerate\' \'ThunderBolt\' & \'Icy Spear\'. Craftable at Forges under the \'MISC\' tab.
author: philbydorro
